Introduction

0WAVE (pronounced as YOUNG WAVE) is a South Korean artist crew under PYRAT, formed by VIIN and founded by Colde. The crew made their debut on December 14, 2022, with the EP album, off the wall.

The members are VIIN, MODS, wooseojun, yukon, and Aiboy.
